constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 150 (Monday, September 19, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. CHU:
H.R. 8878.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Clause 1, Section 8, Article 1 of the United States
Constitution
[Page H7966]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to ensure adequate coverage of outpatient mental health services under the Medicare program.
